items.title: Awesome ad Free
items.content_text:
### Alternatives / File Sharing

*   [Mega](https://mega.nz/) - 50 GB of secure free storage (in which 35 GB will expire after 30 days). Files are encrypted client-side. More (non-permanent) space can be claimed from achievements.
items.content_html:
Alternatives / File Sharing

  • Mega - 50 GB of secure free storage (in which 35 GB will expire after 30 days). Files are encrypted client-side. More (non-permanent) space can be claimed from achievements.

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### URL Shorteners

- API: [Kutt](https://docs.kutt.it/)

  Description: Free Modern URL Shortener

  Auth: `apiKey`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes
items.content_html:
URL Shorteners

  • API: Kutt

    Description: Free Modern URL Shortener

    Auth: apiKey

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Yes

items.title: Awesome Eslint
items.content_text:
### Tools / Testing Tools

*   [editor-info (‚≠ê6)](https://github.com/fisker/editor-info) - Detect whether one is within an editor/IDE and which type, allowing one to tweak ESLint configuration accordingly.
items.content_html:
Tools / Testing Tools

  • editor-info (‚≠ê6) - Detect whether one is within an editor/IDE and which type, allowing one to tweak ESLint configuration accordingly.

items.title: Awesome Devsecops
items.content_text:
### Infrastructure as Code Analysis / Containers

*   [Docker-Bench-Security (‚≠ê9.4k)](https://github.com/docker/docker-bench-security) - *Docker* - The Docker Bench for Security is a script that checks for dozens of common best-practices around deploying Docker containers in production.

### Infrastructure as Code Analysis / Ansible

*   [Ansible-Lint (‚≠ê3.7k)](https://github.com/ansible-community/ansible-lint) - *Ansible Community* - Checks playbooks for practices and behaviour that could potentially be improved. As a community backed project ansible-lint supports only the last two major versions of Ansible.
items.content_html:
Infrastructure as Code Analysis / Containers

  • Docker-Bench-Security (‚≠ê9.4k) - Docker - The Docker Bench for Security is a script that checks for dozens of common best-practices around deploying Docker containers in production.

Infrastructure as Code Analysis / Ansible

  • Ansible-Lint (‚≠ê3.7k) - Ansible Community - Checks playbooks for practices and behaviour that could potentially be improved. As a community backed project ansible-lint supports only the last two major versions of Ansible.
